summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanSelectMultiple As Boolean
public: property bool CanSelectMultiple { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定容器是否允许同时选择多个子元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the container allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

value.span: 如果控件支持多重选择，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control supports multiple selection; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以为动态，例如，在极少数情况下，控件可能允许多个项以选择在初始化，但随后仅允许单选进行。This property can be dynamic For example, in rare cases, a control might allow multiple items to be selected on initialization, but subsequently allow only single selections to be made. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自和随后用于检索属性值。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to retrieve property values. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 检索选择容器中选定的所有项。

span.span: Retrieves all items in the selection container that are selected.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中，一系列获取表示选择容器中的选定的项。In the following example, a collection of s representing the selected items in a selection container is obtained. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#1025](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#1025)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#1025](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#1025)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelectionRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelectionRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定容器是否要求至少选择一个子项。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the container requires at least one child item to be selected.

value.span: 如果该控件要求至少选择一个项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control requires at least one item to be selected; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以是动态的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，控件的初始状态默认可能未选择任何项，指示 是 `false`。For example, the initial state of a control might not have any items selected by default, indicating that is `false`. 但是，选择某一项后，该控件必须始终具有至少一个选定的项。However, after an item is selected, the control must always have at least one item selected. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自和随后用于检索属性值。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to retrieve property values. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
